committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make Inauguration Day a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Makes Inauguration Day, January 20th of each fourth year after 1977, a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make Inauguration Day a legal public holiday.
